overview.title: Revolutionizing Home Furnishing Retail
overview.content: We empower furniture retailers, manufacturers, and interior design businesses with cutting-edge digital solutions. From augmented reality room visualization and 3D product configurators to AI-powered recommendations and virtual showrooms, our technology helps customers visualize their dream spaces while streamlining your operations. Whether you're a boutique store or large retailer, we deliver solutions that enhance customer experience, reduce returns, and drive sales growth in the modern furniture market.

automation.title: AI-Powered Interior Intelligence
automation.description: Our furniture platform uses artificial intelligence to understand customer style preferences, room dimensions, and design trends. Machine learning algorithms suggest complementary products, generate complete room designs, and predict inventory needs based on seasonal trends. Computer vision analyzes customer room photos to recommend perfectly sized and styled furniture pieces, creating a personalized shopping experience that drives satisfaction and sales.
features: AI-powered style matching and product recommendations
Computer vision for room analysis and measurements
Automated 3D model generation from product photos
Predictive inventory management based on trends
